Package io.github.maze11.screens

Class WinScreen

java.lang.Object
io.github.maze11.screens.BaseMenuScreen
io.github.maze11.screens.WinScreen
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.badlogic.gdx.Screen, com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
public class WinScreen extends BaseMenuScreen
Win screen shown when player completes the game. Displays total score and breakdown of how score was calcualted. this scene is triggered when player reaches the exit
